import math

N = int(input())

ans = 0

for i in range(1, N+1):
    if (math.log10(i)+1) % 2 == 1:
        ans += 1

print(ans)
# coding: utf-8

N = int(input())

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N+1):
    if len(str(i)) % 2 == 1:
        ans += 1

print(ans)

N = int(input())

ans = 0

import math
